Artificial Intelligence and Democracy

This document is about the relationship between artificial intelligence and democracy, published by UNESCO in 2024. It explores the impact of AI on democratic systems and societies, and provides insights from experts in the field. The publication is available in open access under the Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 IGO licence (CC-BY-SA 3.0 IGO).

Key Concepts:

  • AI and Democracy
  • Open Access
  • Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 IGO licence
  • profound impact of technology on politics
  • reshaping democratic dynamics
  • redefining political system
  • challenges to informed citizenship
Artificial Intelligence Democracy UNESCO emerging technologies democracy communication information digitalization misinformation
